title: UPDATE 2-ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Women's Singles Seeds Progress
text: May 9, 2018 / 8:44 PM / Updated 17 hours ago UPDATE 3-ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Women's Singles Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 4 Min Read May 10 (OPTA) - Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Women's Singles matches on Wednesday ..
